Scene:
The Riverbank at Tokuan
(Tokuan tsutsumi / 徳庵堤茶店)

Play: The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil (女殺油地獄)

Production: September 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Rodayū V (豊竹呂大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II (see also Tsuruzawa Tokutarō) (鶴沢道八 (二))
